A: 1. The long hand on a clock face is called the _ hand (a)hour (b)minute (c)second
2. The minute hand tells the number of _ past or to the hour (a)hours (b)minutes (c)seconds
3. The short hand on a clock face is called the _ hand (a)minute (b)hour (c)second
4. The clock face shows _ clock times (a)10-hour (b)12-hour (c)24-hour
5. At 4 o'clock, the hour hand points to _ (a)12 (b)4 (c)8
6. At 4 o'clock, the minute hand points to _ (a)4 (b)12 (c)8
7. At 8 o'clock, the hour hand points to _ (a)12 (b)4 (c)8
8. At 8 o'clock, the minute hand points to _ (a)12 (b)4 (c)8
9. 5:00 is an example of _ time (a)analogue (b)digital (c)mixed
10. Half past 5 is an example of _ time (a)digital (b)analogue (c)mixed
11. The time 5:30 is shown as _ time (a)analogue (b)digital (c)written
12. A clock face is part of an _ clock (a)digital (b)analogue (c)smart
13. A number display shows _ time (a)analogue (b)digital (c)face
14. The minute hand moves _ than the hour hand (a)slower (b)faster (c)same
15. How many numbers are typically on a clock face (a)6 (b)10 (c)12
16. The minute hand points to 12 for an _ o'clock (a)half (b)quarter (c)exact
17. When the hour hand is at 3 and the minute hand is at 12, what time is it (a)quarter past 12 (b)3 o'clock (c)12:03
18. What does "half past" mean for minutes (a)15 (b)30 (c)45
19. The small marks on a clock face can represent _ (a)hours (b)minutes (c)days
20. Digital time uses a _ to separate hours and minutes (a)dot (b)colon (c)dash
21. Is 5:00 analogue time (a)Yes (b)No
22. Is "half past 5" digital time (a)Yes (b)No
23. The long hand tells minutes past _ the hour (a)or (b)and (c)but
24. The short hand tells the _ (a)minutes (b)hours (c)seconds
25. A clock shows time (a)True (b)False
26. The minute hand is shorter than the hour hand (a)True (b)False
27. Digital clocks use hands to show time (a)True (b)False
28. Analogue clocks use numbers directly (a)True (b)False
29. 12-hour clock times go up to _ (a)12 (b)24 (c)60
30. The hour hand moves slower (a)True (b)False
B: 1. What is the long hand on a clock called? _________
2. What is the short hand on a clock called? _________
3. How many numbers are on a standard clock face? _________
5. What type of time is "half past 5"? _________

2. What is the purpose of the short hand on a clock?
3. How is 5 o'clock written in digital time?
4. How is half past 5 written in digital time?
5. What type of clock uses hands?
